title: BasicCommandsComment
body: <<command>>text in between commands<<command with "space">>// This is a comment {$ignore} <<if $ignore>> #ignore

title: Option1
body:
Prompt1
-> Option 1
	<< jump Option2>>
This shouldn't show

title: Option2
body:
Prompt2
-> Option 2
	<<jump StopCommand>>
This shouldn't show

title: FunctionConditional
body:
First line
<<if testfunc("firstarg")>>
This shouldn't show
<<elseif testfunc("firstarg", "secondarg")>>
This should show
<<endif>>
After both

title: VisitedFunction
body: <<if visited("VisitedFunctionStart")>>you have visited VisitedFunctionStart!<<endif>><<if visited("SomeOtherNode")>>You have not visited SomeOtherNode!<<endif>>

title: NotVisitedFunction
body:
Hello
<<if not visited("VisitedFunctionStart")>>you have not visited VisitedFunctionStart!<<endif>>
